filmography.title: They Won't Forget
filmography.role_description: A teenage murder victim whose tight sweater in a soda shop scene famously launched Turner's career as the 'Sweater Girl'.
filmography.plot: A Northern teacher is accused of murdering a student in a Southern town, and a prosecutor exploits the case for political gain.

filmography.title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious teenager who complicates Andy Hardy's love life in one of the most popular entries of the MGM series.
filmography.plot: Andy Hardy is caught between three girls while trying to raise money to buy his first car.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Girl
filmography.role_description: A Brooklyn elevator operator who achieves stardom as a Ziegfeld girl but succumbs to alcoholism and tragedy.
filmography.plot: Three women from different backgrounds are hired to be Ziegfeld Girls, and the job changes their lives in different ways.

filmography.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
filmography.role_description: The innocent and devoted fiancée of Dr. Jekyll, cast against type (she swapped roles with Ingrid Bergman).
filmography.plot: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

filmography.title: Honky Tonk
filmography.role_description: A respectable judge's daughter who falls for a con man, marking her first of four pairings with Clark Gable.
filmography.plot: A con man takes over a town, but finds his plans complicated when he falls for the local judge's daughter.

filmography.title: Johnny Eager
filmography.role_description: A sociology student and the DA's daughter who falls in love with a cold-hearted gangster.
filmography.plot: A parole officer's stepdaughter falls for a cold-blooded gangster who uses her to get a dog track permit.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Van Heflin)

filmography.title: Somewhere I'll Find You
filmography.role_description: A war correspondent who becomes the center of a romantic rivalry between two brothers covering WWII.
filmography.plot: Two brothers who are war correspondents cover the war in the Pacific and fall for the same girl.

filmography.title: Slightly Dangerous
filmography.role_description: A bored soda jerk who fakes amnesia and reinvents herself as a long-lost heiress.
filmography.plot: A working girl tired of her dull life disappears and resurfaces as a wealthy amnesiac.

filmography.title: Marriage Is a Private Affair
filmography.role_description: A commitment-phobic woman who struggles with the constraints of wartime marriage and motherhood.
filmography.plot: A young woman rushes into marriage with a soldier but struggles to adjust to domestic life while he is away.

filmography.title: Week-End at the Waldorf
filmography.role_description: A hotel stenographer dreaming of a better life who falls for a wounded soldier in this 'Grand Hotel' remake.
filmography.plot: Several guests at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel in New York deal with romance, mistaken identities, and business deals.

filmography.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
filmography.role_description: The ultimate femme fatale in white; a bored wife who plots with a drifter to murder her husband.
filmography.plot: A drifter working at a roadside diner and the owner's wife hatch a plan to murder her husband.

filmography.title: Green Dolphin Street
filmography.role_description: A headstrong woman who travels to New Zealand to marry a man who actually intended to propose to her sister.
filmography.plot: A man writes to the wrong sister proposing marriage, leading to a complicated life in pioneer New Zealand.

filmography.title: Cass Timberlane
filmography.role_description: A young, working-class woman who marries an older, respected judge, facing the scrutiny of his high-society friends.
filmography.plot: A small-town judge marries a younger woman from the 'wrong side of the tracks,' struggling to bridge their social worlds.

filmography.title: Homecoming
filmography.role_description: An army nurse who falls in love with a married surgeon (Clark Gable) during World War II.
filmography.plot: A married doctor serves in WWII and falls in love with a nurse, forcing him to choose between her and his wife.

filmography.title: The Three Musketeers
filmography.role_description: The chilling and treacherous spy for Cardinal Richelieu, creating one of the screen's most memorable villains.
filmography.plot: D'Artagnan and his three musketeer friends fight to protect the King of France against the scheming Cardinal Richelieu.

filmography.title: A Life of Her Own
filmography.role_description: An ambitious model who becomes involved in a tragic affair with a married man, echoing themes from Turner's own life.
filmography.plot: A small-town girl becomes a top model in New York but finds emptiness in her success and a doomed romance.

filmography.title: The Bad and the Beautiful
filmography.role_description: An alcoholic actress and daughter of a famous star who is molded into a legend by a ruthless producer.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous movie producer alienates a director, an actress, and a writer while making them stars.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress (Gloria Grahame)

filmography.title: The Merry Widow
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American widow in a lavish Technicolor musical, wooed by a count to save his country from bankruptcy.
filmography.plot: A count is ordered to court a rich widow to keep her money in the kingdom of Marshovia.

filmography.title: Betrayed
filmography.role_description: A Dutch intelligence agent suspected of treason while working with the resistance during WWII.
filmography.plot: A Dutch intelligence officer and a resistance leader suspect a traitor in their midst during World War II.

filmography.title: The Prodigal
filmography.role_description: A pagan high priestess of Astarte who seduces the Biblical prodigal son in this campy, lavish epic.
filmography.plot: A Hebrew farm boy leaves home and squanders his inheritance on a pagan priestess in Damascus.

filmography.title: The Sea Chase
filmography.role_description: A German spy aboard a freighter pursued by the British Navy at the outbreak of WWII, starring opposite John Wayne.
filmography.plot: A German freighter captain tries to get his ship back to Germany at the start of WWII while being chased by the British.

filmography.title: The Rains of Ranchipur
filmography.role_description: A bored, adulterous aristocrat in India who finds redemption through love and disaster.
filmography.plot: An Englishwoman in India engages in an affair with a Hindu doctor as natural disasters strike.

filmography.title: Peyton Place
filmography.role_description: A repressed mother with a secret past who tries to control her daughter's life in a scandalous New England town.
filmography.plot: The secrets and scandals of a small New England town are exposed, centering on a mother trying to hide her daughter's illegitimacy.

filmography.title: Another Time, Another Place
filmography.role_description: An American reporter who has a wartime affair with a British correspondent (Sean Connery) and later confronts his widow.
filmography.plot: An American journalist has a tragic affair with a British reporter during WWII and later visits his home village.

filmography.title: Imitation of Life
filmography.role_description: An ambitious actress who sacrifices family time for her career, while her black housekeeper deals with a light-skinned daughter passing as white.
filmography.plot: An aspiring actress and her African-American housekeeper struggle to raise their daughters in a world of prejudice and ambition.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Portrait in Black
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman who conspires with her doctor lover to murder her invalid husband.
filmography.plot: A woman and her lover murder her invalid husband, but then receive anonymous letters claiming knowledge of the crime.

filmography.title: Bachelor in Paradise
filmography.role_description: A suburban housewife who becomes the subject of a bachelor author's study on American domestic life.
filmography.plot: A bachelor author moves to a California suburb to research a book, causing chaos among the local husbands and wives.
filmography.awards: Nominated: Golden Globe Best Actor (Bob Hope)

filmography.title: Madame X
filmography.role_description: A woman forced to abandon her family who descends into degradation, eventually being defended in court by her own unknowing son.
filmography.plot: A woman forced to give up her son and leave her husband sinks into degradation, only to be defended years later by her son in a murder trial.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Actress
